MOBILE APPLICATION: Personalized Activity Recommendation for Improving Sleep Quality using Collaborative Filtering Algorithm

The researchers are the students of Bachelor of Science in Computer Science at Eulogio "Amang" Rodriguez Institute of Science and Technology - Nagtahan, Manila. The purpose of this survey is to gather information through getting an answer from the people that are experiencing a trouble in their sleeping quality/quantity. The audience for this survey questionnaire are for people who are experiencing a sleep deprivation.
Your personal information and your answers will be given the utmost confidentiality and the only the researchers has access for this survey. We appreciate your time and effort for answering the following questions.
1. Are you having any trouble in falling asleep?
2. If you answered “YES” on the previous question, how many times have you experienced this?
3. Based on your own experience, how would you determine a good sleep quality of one person? Click all that applies.
4. Do you think that the pillow that you use affects your sleep quality?
5. What do you think are the factors that causes sleep deprivation? Click all that applies.
6. Are you having any trouble finding your sleep position?
7. Do you think that snoring when a person is asleep is a part of having a sleep deprivation?
8. How do you get a better night sleep?
9. Based on the choices from question no. 8, have you done any of this to help you improve your sleep quality?
10. If you answered "YES" on the previous question, do you think it is helpful and effective?
11. Are you taking any medication to help you fall asleep?
12. Do you still feel tired even after getting a sleep for 7-8 hours?
13. As of now, how do you improve your sleep quantity and quality?
